* **French Document:** https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51800/2025-00222_npp_%28fr.pdf

**Tender Description**___________________

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) invites expressions of interest from qualified service providers to assist with an audit of the Era Food Model, a software tool used for risk assessment and management within the food industry. The audit will evaluate how the Era Food Model allocates and prioritizes CFIA inspection resources, ensures the risk assessment of federally regulated domestic food establishments and licensed food importers is conducted in a reliable and transparent manner, and investigates the role of national sample collection plans and inspection activities.

All qualified service providers are invited to submit a proposal outlining their technical and financial capabilities. **Please note that the audit will exclude CFIA’s ERA models used for risk assessments in other food sectors, such as rendering, feed, and pre-harvest operations, and Importer Risk
